February 23, a baby shark was born
at Burger Zoo in the
Dutch city on February 15. The
strange thing is that this baby shark still doesn't know if
he has a father or
not.  Burger currently has three
large sharks. The staff here are still
trying to increase the number of individuals of
this species. Last year we tried separating
a male from two females after a
month or two of exposure.
together to increase fertility.
This method is effective, although I'm not sure if 100
ph is due to this method or not. The
reason experts cannot confirm
100 ph is because in some species of sharks,
including fish  Female zebra sharks have the ability to give
birth without a male, which is called
parthenogenesis. When they reproduce without a male, the
young have a shorter lifespan because of
genetic problems, but this fish is very
healthy. Wait until it  As adults, we will
test the DNA to see if it has found it or not.
Another explanation is that female zebra sharks can
store sperm for up to 1 year, meaning they
can still conceive many months after
mating.
Zebra sharks are part of
Europe's endangered species conservation program.

boles traditional Polish dance
Unesco has just named it on the list of
intangible cultural heritage of humanity.
This dance was popular in the
18th century in Poland and then spread to all of
Europe. It is gentle, elegant and has a strong
historical imprint.  Historically, the characteristics of
bolognese dance are that dancing helps us
express emotions, but it also requires
interaction and coordination between the two dancers.
Eye contact is very important. The
music also contributes to the popularity of boles.
Throughout Europe, many famous composers
such as Shan Moza or Rakovski once
created music for Diau Bones to serve the
lavish balls of ancient aristocrats, and
Bolognese is listed as an
intangible cultural heritage by UNESCO.
It is not only a traditional
Polish dance but also an international dance
that has opened up most of the
dances in European culture since the beginning of the
